reviews.review_text: Literally the worst controls in any game I have ever played. Space is accept except for sometimes when enter is accept. Delete is cancel. It's a match three game where you have to use WASD to slowly and manually move the cursor instead of using the mouse like any sensible match three game.
This game is published by KISS ltd.  If you did not know, KISS stands for Keep It Simple Stupid.   Not exaclty an inspiring name for a game publisher.
